Image 86: Site logo

Ad Blocker Detected

Thanks for visiting athletics.amherst.edu! [...] ### Story Links

   Results

BOSTON --Junior Cody Pierce and first-year Gavin Schmidt each broke program records as the Amherst College men's track and field team competed at Middlebury's Small College Invitational hosted at the TRACK at new balance on Sunday.

 Pierce established a new record in the 200m while Schmidt broke the school record in the shot put.

 Amherst will resume competition on Friday, February 7 at 3 p.m. and Saturday, February 8 at 10 a.m. the Tufts Cupid Challenge.

THE CASE OF ATHENS Georgios Stampoulidis 787 FROM THE SESSION “TO WATCH, TO ACT, TO DIRECT” SEMIOTICS (OF CINEMA)’S NOT [...] Its power to coordinate specific, vivid images provides index with the means to suggest novel propositions, assertions, and arguments. Peirce memorializes this relational role by charac­ terizing index as Pheme, and as Dicisign (1904: 8.334-9; 1906: MS295: 26; 1908: EP2:489-90). Ultimately, index integrates the logical with the phenomenological and the empirical with the semiotic – when it deploys relational operators to trace event templates and to predict partici­ pant’s perspectives. As such, interpreters restructure thought and action and recommend sound courses of action for diverse event participants. 1.
